title: Oh no, Chet!
description:
Jalen & Jacoby talk over the breaking news that #2 pick in the draft, Chet Holmgren will be out for the season, after injuring his foot playing in a summer run with LeBron, Tatum, and a host of other stars. What does that mean for him, the Thunder, and the League? The guys fill you in. Plus, the Jazz trade a lead guard who's been in the news of late - no, no not Donovan Mitchell... Pat Bev. And we have a soft move or boss move that you have to see to believe, with some relationship advice in the podcast exclusive. Check it out! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Chet Holmgren is out for the season and Pat Bev gets traded to the Lakers.
